doc.title: A Family Affair
doc.plot: A dysfunctional family quarrels over their recently deceased grandmother's missing will; delivering a bundle of delightful laugh-out-loud moments, shocks, and surprises. Everyone has their greedy hands in the mix from the crazy alcoholic Aunt, her hypocritical brother, his two-faced wife, and even the posh-clueless neighbors that puts this ensemble of relatable and funny characters on a hunt for grandma's treasures. It takes the youngest member of the family and his heartbroken grandfather to show the rest of the adults what it truly means to be a family.
